desc: Our subscription boxes feature a brand new recipe and baking kit to bake our delicious bakes of the month. Choose from sweet or savoury bakes and like our famous baking kits they contains all of the dry ingredients you’ll need, an easy to follow recipe card and some handy extras.

layout.text: All three of our subscription boxes feature a brand new recipe and baking kit, delivered to your door so you can bake our delicious creations every month.
